attributes.label: Cash Crop Interseed
attributes.description: Cover crop’s suitability for establishment into a standing cash crop, either early in the growing season or just prior to harvest.

attributes.label: Delayed Emergence
attributes.description: Risk of previous cover crop emerging as a weed in current cash crop typically due to hard seed.

attributes.label: Drought Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

attributes.label: Erosion Fighter
attributes.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

attributes.label: Establishment Challenges
attributes.description: Relative ease or difficulty of establishing.

attributes.label: Flood Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

attributes.label: Fly-free Date
attributes.description: States whether or not the Hessian fly-free date should be displayed for that cover crop. (These dates are predictions on when most Hessian fly adults would no longer be alive and lay eggs in wheat fields. Varies by county)

attributes.label: Frost Seed
attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.label: Good Grazing
attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.label: Grain Seed Harvest
attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.label: Lasting Residue
attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.label: Legume Nitrogen Source
attributes.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

attributes.label: Limited Rainfall
attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Low Fertility Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from low soil fertility.

attributes.label: Mature Incorporation Challenges
attributes.description: Rates difficulty of incorporating a relatively mature stand, i.e., how hard is it to till a big stand of a cover crop (not recommended).

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease
attributes.description: Ability to fight pests for the cash crop by suppressing or eliminating damage.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to suppress or limit damage from nematodes.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K
attributes.description: Cover crop's ability to make soil P and K more readily available to crops.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Loosens Topsoil
attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler
attributes.description: Rates cover crop ability to reduce compaction by penetrating the plow pan.

attributes.label: Termination Methods
attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Winter Survival
attributes.description: The likelihood that a crop will survive a typical winter

attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.label: Lasting Residue
attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.label: Legume Nitrogen Source
attributes.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

attributes.label: Limited Rainfall
attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Low Fertility Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from low soil fertility.

attributes.label: Mature Incorporation Challenges
attributes.description: Rates difficulty of incorporating a relatively mature stand, i.e., how hard is it to till a big stand of a cover crop (not recommended).

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K

attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler

attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease
attributes.description: Ability to fight pests for the cash crop by suppressing or eliminating damage.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to suppress or limit damage from nematodes.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K
attributes.description: Cover crop's ability to make soil P and K more readily available to crops.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Loosens Topsoil
attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler
attributes.description: Rates cover crop ability to reduce compaction by penetrating the plow pan.

attributes.label: Termination Methods
attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Winter Survival
attributes.description: The likelihood that a crop will survive a typical winter

goals.label: Cash Crop Interseed
goals.description: Cover crop’s suitability for establishment into a standing cash crop, either early in the growing season or just prior to harvest.

goals.label: Drought Tolerance
goals.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

goals.label: Erosion Fighter
goals.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

goals.label: Flood Tolerance
goals.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

goals.label: Good Grazing
goals.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

goals.label: Grain Seed Harvest
goals.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

goals.label: Heat Tolerance
goals.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

goals.label: Lasting Residue
goals.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

goals.label: Legume Nitrogen Source
goals.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

goals.label: Limited Rainfall
goals.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Cash Crop Interseed

attributes.label: Delayed Emergence
attributes.description: Risk of previous cover crop emerging as a weed in current cash crop typically due to hard seed.

attributes.label: Drought Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

attributes.label: Erosion Fighter
attributes.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

attributes.label: Establishment Challenges
attributes.description: Relative ease or difficulty of establishing.

attributes.label: Flood Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

attributes.label: Fly-free Date
attributes.description: States whether or not the Hessian fly-free date should be displayed for that cover crop. (These dates are predictions on when most Hessian fly adults would no longer be alive and lay eggs in wheat fields. Varies by county)

attributes.label: Frost Seed
attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.label: Good Grazing
attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.label: Grain Seed Harvest
attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.label: Cash Crop Interseed
attributes.description: Cover crop’s suitability for establishment into a standing cash crop, either early in the growing season or just prior to harvest.

attributes.label: Delayed Emergence
attributes.description: Risk of previous cover crop emerging as a weed in current cash crop typically due to hard seed.

attributes.label: Drought Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

attributes.label: Erosion Fighter
attributes.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

attributes.label: Establishment Challenges
attributes.description: Relative ease or difficulty of establishing.

attributes.label: Flood Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

attributes.label: Fly-free Date
attributes.description: States whether or not the Hessian fly-free date should be displayed for that cover crop. (These dates are predictions on when most Hessian fly adults would no longer be alive and lay eggs in wheat fields. Varies by county)

attributes.label: Frost Seed
attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Cash Crop Interseed
attributes.description: Cover crop’s suitability for establishment into a standing cash crop, either early in the growing season or just prior to harvest.

attributes.label: Delayed Emergence
attributes.description: Risk of previous cover crop emerging as a weed in current cash crop typically due to hard seed.

attributes.label: Drought Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

attributes.label: Erosion Fighter
attributes.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

attributes.label: Establishment Challenges
attributes.description: Relative ease or difficulty of establishing.

attributes.label: Flood Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

attributes.label: Fly-free Date
attributes.description: States whether or not the Hessian fly-free date should be displayed for that cover crop. (These dates are predictions on when most Hessian fly adults would no longer be alive and lay eggs in wheat fields. Varies by county)

attributes.label: Frost Seed
attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.label: Good Grazing
attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.label: Grain Seed Harvest
attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.label: Lasting Residue
attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.label: Legume Nitrogen Source
attributes.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

attributes.label: Limited Rainfall
attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Low Fertility Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from low soil fertility.

attributes.label: Mature Incorporation Challenges
attributes.description: Rates difficulty of incorporating a relatively mature stand, i.e., how hard is it to till a big stand of a cover crop (not recommended).

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease
attributes.description: Ability to fight pests for the cash crop by suppressing or eliminating damage.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to suppress or limit damage from nematodes.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K
attributes.description: Cover crop's ability to make soil P and K more readily available to crops.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Loosens Topsoil
attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler
attributes.description: Rates cover crop ability to reduce compaction by penetrating the plow pan.

attributes.label: Termination Methods
attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Winter Survival
attributes.description: The likelihood that a crop will survive a typical winter

attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.label: Good Grazing
attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.label: Grain Seed Harvest
attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributes.label: Lasting Residue
attributes.description: Rates the effectiveness of the cover crop in providing a long-lasting mulch.

attributes.label: Legume Nitrogen Source
attributes.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

attributes.label: Limited Rainfall
attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Low Fertility Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from low soil fertility.

attributes.label: Mature Incorporation Challenges
attributes.description: Rates difficulty of incorporating a relatively mature stand, i.e., how hard is it to till a big stand of a cover crop (not recommended).

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease
attributes.description: Ability to fight pests for the cash crop by suppressing or eliminating damage.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to suppress or limit damage from nematodes.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K
attributes.description: Cover crop's ability to make soil P and K more readily available to crops.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Loosens Topsoil
attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler
attributes.description: Rates cover crop ability to reduce compaction by penetrating the plow pan.

attributes.label: Termination Methods
attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Winter Survival
attributes.description: The likelihood that a crop will survive a typical winter

attributes.description: A legume cover crop's ability to supply fixed N.

attributes.label: Limited Rainfall
attributes.description: Cover crop’s ability to establish and produce biomass in limited rainfall environments.

attributes.label: Low Fertility Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from low soil fertility.

attributes.label: Mature Incorporation Challenges
attributes.description: Rates difficulty of incorporating a relatively mature stand, i.e., how hard is it to till a big stand of a cover crop (not recommended).

attributes.label: Mechanical Forage Harvest
attributes.description: Yield and quality of harvested forage. This includes dry hay, baleage, and silage.

attributes.label: Nitrogen Scavenger
attributes.description: Rates a cover crop's ability to take up and store excess nitrogen.

attributes.label: Other - Attract Beneficials
attributes.description: Extent to which the cover crop provides habitat for beneficial insects, strongly influenced by benefit to pollinators.

attributes.label: Other - Bears Traffic
attributes.description: Accomodating field traffic (foot or vehicle).

attributes.label: Other - Short Windows
attributes.description: Indicates likelihood of fitting short growing windows or short durations.

attributes.label: Quick Growth
attributes.description: The speed of establishment and growth.

attributes.label: Shade Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from shade.

attributes.label: Soil Builder
attributes.description: Organic matter yield and soil structure improvement.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Allelopathic
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by natural herbicidal (allelopathic) action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Choke Weeds
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to fight weeds by competition/smothering action.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Disease
attributes.description: Ability to fight pests for the cash crop by suppressing or eliminating damage.

attributes.label: Soil Ecology - Nematodes
attributes.description: Rates a cover crops ability to suppress or limit damage from nematodes.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Frees P and K
attributes.description: Cover crop's ability to make soil P and K more readily available to crops.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Loosens Topsoil
attributes.description: Ability to reduce compaction and improve topsoil.

attributes.label: Soil Impact - Subsoiler
attributes.description: Rates cover crop ability to reduce compaction by penetrating the plow pan.

attributes.label: Termination Methods
attributes.description: Effective methods of killing a cover crop

attributes.label: Weed Fighter
attributes.description: How well the cover crop out competes weeds by any means through its life cycle, including killed residue.

attributes.label: Winter Survival
attributes.description: The likelihood that a crop will survive a typical winter

attributes.label: Cash Crop Interseed
attributes.description: Cover crop’s suitability for establishment into a standing cash crop, either early in the growing season or just prior to harvest.

attributes.label: Delayed Emergence
attributes.description: Risk of previous cover crop emerging as a weed in current cash crop typically due to hard seed.

attributes.label: Drought Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from drought.

attributes.label: Erosion Fighter
attributes.description: General ability of a cover crop to prevent wind and water erosion through roots holding soil in place and top growth intercepting wind and raindrop impact. Influenced by seasonality (ie. Winter killed crops typically rate lower).

attributes.label: Establishment Challenges
attributes.description: Relative ease or difficulty of establishing.

attributes.label: Flood Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from flood.

attributes.label: Fly-free Date
attributes.description: States whether or not the Hessian fly-free date should be displayed for that cover crop. (These dates are predictions on when most Hessian fly adults would no longer be alive and lay eggs in wheat fields. Varies by county)

attributes.label: Frost Seed
attributes.description: States whether or not a cover crop is suitable for frost seeding (broadcast seeding typically of small seeded crops in late winter when freeze/thaw cycles work seed into the ground for better seed/soil contact)

attributes.label: Good Grazing
attributes.description: Relative production, nutritional quality and palatability of the cover crop as a forage. Does not account for harvestability.

attributes.label: Grain Seed Harvest
attributes.description: The cover crop's economic value as a seed or grain crop, bearing in mind the relative market value, harvestability, and probable yields.

attributes.label: Heat Tolerance
attributes.description: How well a crop is likely to endure despite stress from heat.

attributes.label: Hinders Crops
attributes.description: Risk of cover crop negatively impacting the cash crop by any means, including allelopathy, N immobilization, etc.

attributes.label: Increased Crop Diseases
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to cash crop disease.

attributes.label: Increased Insects/Nematodes
attributes.description: Likelihood of a cover crop contributing to an insect or nematode pest risk.

attributes.label: Increased Weed Potential
attributes.description: Likelihood of cover crop becoming a weed risk through hard seed, reseeding, and difficulty terminating.

attributions.generalStatement: We, MCCC have released our species selection and seeding rate calculator data under the CC-BY4.0 license. These datasets were developed using comparative ratings and council's dataset should be used in its entirety. Data exclusions will skew meaning. In accordance with the license, you may share or adapt this data, even for commercial use. You must include appropriate attribution for council's data set. Please use the attribution templates below, include the version number and date pulled from the API and record any modifications to or exclusions of data. For more information on how Create Commons licenses are applied to data, see this link: https://wiki.creativecommons.org/wiki/Data.
